mapper.select: select T.JFNode as bsId,T.AlarmText as name from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( order by JFNode,AlarmTime ASC ) as row_number,T1.* from ( select * from tb_AlarmRecording where AlarmDate=#{time} and state='报警' and DevNode='0051' and NodeID='1003' ) as T1) as T
select count(*) as total from tb_AlarmRecording where AlarmDate=#{time} and State='报警' and DevNode ='0051' and NodeID='1003' and flag=0
mapper.update: update tb_AlarmRecording set flag=1 where id in(select id from tb_AlarmRecording where AlarmDate=#{time} and State='报警' and DevNode ='0051' and NodeID='1003' and flag=0)
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from tb_AlarmRecording where AlarmDate=#{time} and State='报警'
select top 500 * from tb_AlarmRecording where AlarmDate=#{time} and State='报警' order by AlarmTime desc
